field.name: so_the_ts
field.check: so_the_ts not in (select so_the_ts from dmts where kieu_kh = 1)⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where ngay_ks >= @currentDate)⩓not exists(select 1 from ctslts b where #unit.so_the_ts = b.so_the_ts and b.nam = @$nam and b.ky = @$ky) and #unit.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from ctslts b where #unit.so_the_ts = b.so_the_ts and b.nam = @$nam and b.ky = @$ky) and #unit.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_edit = 1)

text.v: Cập nhật sản lượng thực hiện của TSCĐ

processing.text:
if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'FAProductionInput', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
declare @field varchar(32), @currentDate smalldatetime, @r int select @currentDate = dateadd(mm, 1, cast(str(@$nam, 4) + replace(str(@$ky, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime)) - 1
-- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from ctslts b where a.so_the_ts = b.so_the_ts and b.nam = @$nam and b.ky = @$ky)
create table #unit (ma_dvcs char(32), so_the_ts char(32), stt int) insert into #unit select b.ma_dvcs, a.so_the_ts, a.stt from @@table a join dmts b on a.so_the_ts = b.so_the_ts
-- Checking &Checking;
&EndErrorMode;
-- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join ctslts b on a.so_the_ts = b.so_the_ts where b.nam = @$nam and b.ky = @$ky delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.so_the_ts = b.so_the_ts)
-- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin &Updating; and a.nam = @$nam and a.ky = @$ky end
